info.author: Viktor Kerkez
info.description:
``samovar`` is a tool managing multiple workspaces with multiple repositories in each of them.
It performs bulk ``hg`` operations on all the repositories from the workspace (if not instructed otherwise).
info.name: samovar
info.summary: samovar is a workspace management tool
info.html_description: samovar is a tool managing multiple workspaces with multiple repositories in each of them. It performs bulk hg operations on all the repositories from the workspace (if not instructed otherwise).
